document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Grady on the east coast.
document_data.name: Grady
document_data.mainbody: '''Grady''' was a small coastal town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Grady was located along the [[High King's Road]] in southern Callidyrr in the county of [[Stirgewick]]. The town sat along the eastern coast with the [[Strait of Alaron]] just west of [[Rushdown Wood]].
